title: Best of Design Matters: Catherine Opie
description: At 8 years old, Catherine Opie realized “that history is made within an image culture”—and here, she discusses her incredible life as a photographer driven by culture.
itunes:subtitle: At 8 years old, Catherine Opie realized “that history is made within an image culture”—and here, she discusses her incredible life as a photographer driven by culture.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
